about_the_game:
The conflict ended and a new continent of opportunity appeared!
Don't wake up uninvited guests asleep in the ground, mark the terrain and carve out routes!

Mine From Here is a MineSweeperbased roguelike game.

The characteristics of Mine From Here alone, which differ from the classical method, are as follows.
  • The main goal of the game is to move across the minefield to the next target area.
  • Nothing happens just by scanning the mine!
  • Limited resources! Limited number of times a tile can be scanned!
  • Scans and other items can be obtained during the game! Win rewards with luck and reasoning!



Tired of too much reasoning and dilemma?

Do you want a full-fledged operation for development?

Strengthen your vehicle, scan your route, and remove anything that blocks the road ahead!

This time, we will pay you in money, not in scans!

Carefully manage your funds in each balance and select and use the appropriate items!

Don't wake up uninvited guests asleep in the ground, mark the terrain and carve out routes!

The characteristics of Mine From Here alone, which differ from the classical method, are as follows.
  • The main goal of the game is to move across the minefield to the next target area.
  • Nothing happens just by scanning the mine!
  • Limited resources! Limited number of times a tile can be scanned!
  • Scans and other items can be obtained during the game! Win rewards with luck and reasoning!



Tired of too much reasoning and dilemma?

Do you want a full-fledged operation for development?

Strengthen your vehicle, scan your route, and remove anything that blocks the road ahead!

This time, we will pay you in money, not in scans!

Carefully manage your funds in each balance and select and use the appropriate items!
name: Mine From Here Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 level video card: AMD Radeon 5750 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 level video card: AMD Radeon 66XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Avoid mine and find route to develop this new land of opportunity! MINE FROM HERE is a 2D rouge-like puzzle game inspired by minesweeper. Scan the map, find the mine, get item and drive your rover to escape from mindfield!
